Some tweaks are made to sleeping:
If a player does not input any keystrokes or mouse clicks for 2 minutes, they'll be marked as AFK. AFK players do not count towards the sleep vote.
When a player enters a bed, that action and the amount of players sleeping is broadcasted to the server.
A percentage of players required for the day to turn over can be configured, defaulting to 100%.
This feature was introduced in Minecraft 1.12.
